page.title: 12NURSERIES
page.content: Mr Williams of Mylor Nurseries has been in the agricultural buiseness for nearly 60 years.All the crops are imported and exported locally around Devon and Cornwall.The main crop is tomatoes,but also grown are,lettuce, potatoes,cabbage,barley and sometimes wheat.All the tomatoes are grown in Irish Peat bags.The temperature needed for a successful crop is 20C in the day,15C in the night.Employed in the nurseries are 8 part workers and 6 full time workers.As well as growing vegetables the nurseries also have 3 acres of anenomies which is a good Winter crop.The best selling flower on the market is Collum Stock.Mostly all of the feeding and watering of the crops is done by machine.
